entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Health Check Causes Memory Leak in .NET 8 #54405
  • Link Generation - Incorrect Route Template Matching with literal in path #54403
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, single_query #54402
  • MVC view with _framework/blazor.web.js doesn't import *.lib.module.js #54397
  • Feature request: ViewComponent bind attributes to public properties #54396
  • source-built aspnetcore fails during node build on RHEL8 #54394
  • source-built aspnetcore fails during rollup on ppc64le #54393
  • Perf regression: plaintext, updates #54392

Closed

  • Milestones - Inconsistencies #52113
    9.0-preview3
  • Quarantine CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #50802
    9.0-preview3
  • Add FallbackTestPseudoElement property to LinkTagHelper #52529
  • Perf improvement: json #54364
  • Dependabot npm registry url is incorrect #54360
  • Blazor WebAssembly Standalone App template in VS2022 17.9.2/Net 8.0.201 with MIP when published to Azure logout => 404 => '"undefined" is not valid JSON'' #54391
  • Blazor Stream Rendering not working on Azure Web Apps #54390
  • Converting existing Blazor Hosted project to Blazor Web App resulting in missing index.html #54313
  • Documentation for integrating azure b2c on blazor interactive mode auto .net 8 #54310
    9.0-preview2
  • Quarantine ComponentDisposeMethodThrowsExceptionTerminatesTheCircuit #46836
    9.0-preview3
  • Quarantine `ClosingTheBrowserWindow_GracefullyDisconnects_TheCurrentCircuit` #44185
    9.0-preview3
  • JSInterop: Handle that rejected JS promises can be any type. #54383
  • Perf improvement: single_query #54381

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove CheckStdoutWithLargeWrites_TestSink test from retry list #54406
    area-infrastructure
  • fix: remove double logging of BadHttpRequest errors #54395
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e4fdb87` to `31993df` #54398
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3
  • Fix `LocationChangingHandlers_CannotCancelTheNavigationAsynchronously_UntilReturning` #54388
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview3
  • [release/8.0] Disable buffering of Blazor streaming responses #53930
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.4
  • [release/8.0] Delete markdownlint workflow #54042
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.4
  • [release/8.0] Update CODEOWNERS #54043
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Update Nuget dependencies #54142
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.29
  • [release/8.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #54240
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #54241
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.18
  • [release/6.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #54242
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.29
  • [release/8.0] Introduce a read-only mode for data protection keyring consumers #54266
    area-dataprotection, Servicing-approved, 8.0.4
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `31993df` #54400
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.29
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `31993df` #54399
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.4
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `31993df` #54401
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.18
  • Update branding to 7.0.18 #54379
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.18
  • Update branding to 8.0.4 #54380
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.4
  • Update branding to 6.0.29 #54378
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.29
  • Update milestones for April #54404
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3
  • Fix dependabot `npm-registry` url #54362
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview3
  • Unquarantine ComponentLifecycleMethodThrowsExceptionTerminatesTheCircuit and ComponentLifecycleMethodThrowsExceptionTerminatesTheCircuit #54373
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview3
  • Unquarantine CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #54339
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview3
  • Fix `MouseOverAndMouseOut_CanTrigger` #54389
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview3
  • Unquarantine `ClosingTheBrowserWindow_GracefullyDisconnects_TheCurrentCircuit` #54387
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview3
  • Fix spelling in OAuthHandler #53762
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security, 9.0-preview3

Updated

  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.3.24153.2 #54345
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Use constant values for CorsPolicy.cs and CorsPolicyBuilder.cs #54247
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Preserve RemoteAuthenticationContext during JS interop #54225
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/6.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53158
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
